pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Spatial-Time Sequence Miner // Implementations of the algorithms present in the future article Generalized Discovery of Tight Space-Time Sequences, original title (Castro Filho, A. J. ; Borges, H. ; Pacitti, Esther ; Porto, F. ; Coutinho, R. ; Ogasawara, E. . Generalizao de Minerao de Sequncias Restritas no Espao e no Tempo. In: XXXVI SBBD - Simpsio Brasileiro de Banco de Dados, 2021).
